description: Made for FreeTON validators community https://t.me/freetonvalidators by @dnugget

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_recv),1s)*8 as "in"  FROM "net" WHERE host=~/$server/ AND interface =~ /$netif/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_sent),1s)*8 as "out" FROM "net" WHERE host=~/$server/ AND interface =~ /$netif/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)
SELECT mean("usage_idle") * -1 + 100 FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT mean("usage_iowait") FROM "cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT max("ds") FROM "exec_iostatiostat" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "exec_balance1" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_recv),1s)*8 as "in"  FROM "net" WHERE host=~/$server/ AND interface =~ /$netif/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_sent),1s)*8 as "in"  FROM "net" WHERE host=~/$server/ AND interface =~ /$netif/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM system WITH KEY=host
list.name: server
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM system WITH KEY=host

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "diskio" WITH KEY = "name" WHERE host =~ /$server/
list.name: disk
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "diskio" WITH KEY = "name" WHERE host =~ /$server/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "net" WITH KEY = "interface" WHERE host =~ /$server/
list.name: netif
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "net" WITH KEY = "interface" WHERE host =~ /$server/

title: FreeTON dashboard
